item.title: Software development is a very young discipline
item.description:
Software development is a very young discipline

In 2009 I hired a building contractor to build a house. Together with an architect and the contractor I worked out the features. We wanted a basement, we carefully picked the materials, the location of the windows, the placement of the rooms, the bathroom, the attic and everything the contractor needed to come up with a price and a delivery date. About a year-and-a-half later the house was completed.
